text:
Very Professional in managing their patience. Staff is very knowledgeable in the product and able to patiently adapt the product to fit the patience’s handicap. My set was set very well and improve my hearing as soon as I step out of the office.
Great job in explaining my hearing loss profile and explains the recommended product to compensate my needs.
Well done and looking forward to my follow up appointment in one month’s time.
Thank you

The waiting area provided is very good. (i could wait all day and be happy waiting to be called in to the consultation room).
High level of professionalism in the service provided by both Fion and Jela who were additionally very sensitive in handling my queries.
From the rental of hearing aid to owning my own, Gela and Fion have helped me a lot. Highly recommended for those who have hearing loss and would like an expert to look into their case.
Bought the signia hearing aid since 2019. The centre has been following regularly with me to maintain the hearing aid. I appreciate the service very much.
Brenda Fu is very helpful and responsive. She often provide her support even after working hours. I can even contact her via WhatsApp. Thank you Brenda for the super good after service support.
